Get Started

Our Beginning

Felix launched in 2023 as a revolutionary streaming platform. What began as a small startup with just 50 movies has grown into a global entertainment hub with thousands of titles. Our founders believed everyone deserves affordable access to quality entertainment, and that vision drives us today.

Where We're Headed

We're investing heavily in original content, with 50 new Felix Originals coming next year. Our technology team is developing advanced recommendation algorithms and 4K streaming for all devices. The future of Felix includes interactive content, virtual reality experiences, and making our platform available in 50+ new languages.
